experience.title: Senior Consultant
experience.description: We are an end-to-end financial and investment services organization that provides a host of solutions. We assess your finance strategy and objectives, assist you in designing and implementing changes to your organization's finances, processes and systems to enhance the overall value of your firm. Our financial process solutions benefit you with the advisory, process building and financial planning services that assure financial transformation with worthwhile results. for any financial requirements contact me at Kakkardevikay@gmail.com

experience.title: Senior Associate
experience.description: CapitalSquare Advisors Private Limited, a fast-growing mid-market focused Investment Bank. Powered by Professionals CapitalSquare offers wide array of financial advisory services viz. Debt & Equity fund raising, Merchant Banking, Private Equity, Mergers & Acquisition, Corporate Advisory, Insurance Broking and Project Consultancy. Also a SEBI registered Category-I Merchant Banker and is engaged in services such as: Initial Public Offer (IPO); Main Board and SME Platform, Qualified Institutions Placement (QIP), Preferential Issue, Rights Issue, Open offer, Takeover, Buy-backs, Delisting and Valuation. Moreover, being empanelled with leading Public Sector Banks they are also active in preparation of TEV Reports and Financial Models. for any queries contact kakkardevikay@gmail.com
